title: What to Expect on Your First Appointment at IMI - Integrative Medical Institute of Orange County
sitename: Integrative Medical Institute of Orange County
cleaned_text: What to Expect on Your First Appointment at IMI Our experienced team of professionals assist patients in achieving optimal levels of health and wellness by treating the mind and body together. Here is what to expect as a new patient to IMI. 01 PREPARING FOR YOUR CONSULTATION 02 THE CONSULTATION AND AFTER DOWNLOAD AND FILL FORMS Please fill out the packets of paperwork below and have them ready for your appointment, along with any recent blood work or testing you have completed.
